ygData.subject: Re: Monk Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I would not recommend you hunting Avocets in a group until you are at least 26-27 as they are 29-30 lvl mobs. ... From: Lombard.Mikhael
ygData.messageBody:
I would not recommend you hunting Avocets in a group until you are at least
26-27 as they are 29-30 lvl mobs.


----- Original Message -----
From: Lombard.Mikhael <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 1999 7:13 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions


> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> Thanks, where else is a good place, I have been living in LAke Rathe for
the
> last couple commercials.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Imari J. A. Dellimore [mailto:ijad@...]
> Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 1:55 PM
> To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions
>
>
> From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
>
> At level 21 you would be a near the level of an Avo hunting group - bear
> in mind avocets range up to level 30 or so. So a good levle to group to
> get em is levle 25 or so. However in a well balanced group wehre you are
> one of the lower memebrs, youcould probably take down avo's - just be
> sure the puller kows what he is doing - pulling more than one will likely
> cause a great deal of hurt....
>
> On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, Lombard.Mikhael wrote:
>
> > From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >
> > I just hit 21st level what level can you solo avocets or group to kill
> them?
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Robb Flynn [mailto:RobF@...]
> > Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 1:35 PM
> > To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
> > Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions
> >
> >
> > From: Robb Flynn <RobF@...>
> >
> > hang in there... I too have been living avocets for the past couple of
> weeks
> > and never saw one until yesterday, when I got 2 within an hour.
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Dave Gaines [SMTP:dave@...]
> > > Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 3:31 PM
> > > To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> > > Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions
> > >
> > > From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
> > >
> > > Black pearls come from Aviak Avocets right? I have killed all the
> > > avocets I really want to kill and have never gotten a black pearl.
> > >
> > > How rare of these suckers?
> > >
> > > Also, Quillmane seems to have some decent Monk equipment, do you
> > > take a faction hit for killing him? The equipment is no_drop.
> > >
> > >
> >
> > >
>
>
>
>
